item.title: Getting started with accelerated computing
item.description: Utilizing GPUs for general computing is not new. Today, several frameworks enable developers to obtain the advantages of SIMT (Single instruction, multiple threads) architectures, such as OpenCL, OpenMP, OpenACC, or even Metal on OSx and CUDA.
